author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Vicon Reports Q2 Loss Per Share $0.08
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Vicon Industries Inc:
* VICON REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE SECOND QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018
* Q2 REVENUE ROSE 22 PERCENT TO $7.3 MILLION * WILL LIKELY REQUIRE ADDITIONAL FINANCING OVER NEXT TWELVE MONTHS TO IMPLEMENT ITS PLANNED BUSINESS OBJECTIVES AND STRATEGIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
